townsfolk.name: acrobat
townsfolk.description: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

townsfolk.name: alchemist
townsfolk.description: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.

townsfolk.name: alsaahir
townsfolk.description: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

townsfolk.name: amnesiac
townsfolk.description: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

townsfolk.name: artist
townsfolk.description: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

townsfolk.name: atheist
townsfolk.description: the storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. there are no evil roles in play.

townsfolk.name: balloonist
townsfolk.description: each night, you learn a player of a different Role type than last night. +0 or +1 outsider.

townsfolk.name: banshee
townsfolk.description: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

townsfolk.name: bounty hunter
townsfolk.description: you start knowing 1 evil player. if the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. 1 townsfolk is evil.

townsfolk.name: cannibal
townsfolk.description: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

townsfolk.name: chambermaid
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

townsfolk.name: chef
townsfolk.description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

townsfolk.name: choirboy
townsfolk.description: if the demon kills the king, you learn which player is the demon. There is a King in play.

townsfolk.name: clockmaker
townsfolk.description: you start knowing how many houses the demon is to its nearest minion.

townsfolk.name: courtier
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose a role: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

townsfolk.name: cult leader
townsfolk.description: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

townsfolk.name: dreamer
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil role, 1 of which is correct.

townsfolk.name: empath
townsfolk.description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

townsfolk.name: engineer
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

townsfolk.name: exorcist
townsfolk.description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

townsfolk.name: farmer
townsfolk.description: When you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.

townsfolk.name: fisherman
townsfolk.description: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help your team win.

townsfolk.name: flowergirl
townsfolk.description: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.

townsfolk.name: fool
townsfolk.description: The 1st time you die, you don't.

townsfolk.name: fortune teller
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

townsfolk.name: gambler
townsfolk.description: Each night*, choose a player & guess their role: if you guess wrong, you die.

townsfolk.name: general
townsfolk.description: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.

townsfolk.name: gossip
townsfolk.description: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

townsfolk.name: grandmother
townsfolk.description: You start knowing a good player & their role. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

townsfolk.name: high priestess
townsfolk.description: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

townsfolk.name: huntsman
townsfolk.description: once per game, at night, choose a living player: the damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play townsfolk. There is a damsel in play.

townsfolk.name: innkeeper
townsfolk.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

townsfolk.name: investigator
townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

townsfolk.name: juggler
townsfolk.description: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' roles. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

townsfolk.name: king
townsfolk.description: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive role. The Demon knows you are the King.

townsfolk.name: knight
townsfolk.description: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

townsfolk.name: librarian
townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

townsfolk.name: lycanthrope
townsfolk.description: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesnâ€™t kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.

townsfolk.name: magician
townsfolk.description: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.

townsfolk.name: mathematician
townsfolk.description: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another role's ability.

townsfolk.name: mayor
townsfolk.description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

townsfolk.name: minstrel
townsfolk.description: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

townsfolk.name: monk
townsfolk.description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

townsfolk.name: nightwatchman
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn you are the Nightwatchman.

townsfolk.name: noble
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn you are the Nightwatchman.

townsfolk.name: oracle
townsfolk.description: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

townsfolk.name: pacifist
townsfolk.description: Executed good players might not die.

townsfolk.name: philosopher
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose a good role: gain that ability. If this role is in play, they are drunk.

townsfolk.name: pixie
townsfolk.description: you start knowing 1 in-play townsfolk. if you pretend to be this role you gain their ability when they die.

townsfolk.name: poppy grower
townsfolk.description: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.

townsfolk.name: preacher
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.

townsfolk.name: professor
townsfolk.description: Once per game at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

townsfolk.name: ravenkeeper
townsfolk.description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their role.

townsfolk.name: sage
townsfolk.description: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

townsfolk.name: sailor
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

townsfolk.name: savant
townsfolk.description: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

townsfolk.name: seamstress
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

townsfolk.name: shugenja
townsfolk.description: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

townsfolk.name: slayer
townsfolk.description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

townsfolk.name: snake charmer
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps roles & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

townsfolk.name: soldier
townsfolk.description: You are safe from the Demon.

townsfolk.name: steward
townsfolk.description: You start knowing 1 good player.

townsfolk.name: tea lady
townsfolk.description: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

townsfolk.name: town crier
townsfolk.description: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

townsfolk.name: undertaker
townsfolk.description: Each night*, you learn which role died by execution today.

townsfolk.name: village idiot
townsfolk.description: each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. +0 or +2 village idiots. one of the extras is drunk.

townsfolk.name: virgin
townsfolk.description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

townsfolk.name: washerwoman
townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

outsiders.name: barber
outsiders.description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap roles.

outsiders.name: butler
outsiders.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

outsiders.name: damsel
outsiders.description: All Minions know a Damsel is in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.

outsiders.name: drunk
outsiders.description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk role, but you are not.

outsiders.name: golem
outsiders.description: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

outsiders.name: goon
outsiders.description: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

outsiders.name: hatter
outsiders.description: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon roles to be.

outsiders.name: heretic
outsiders.description: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.

outsiders.name: klutz
outsiders.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

outsiders.name: lunatic
outsiders.description: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

outsiders.name: moonchild
outsiders.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

outsiders.name: mutant
outsiders.description: if you are say you are an outsider, you might be executed.

outsiders.name: ogre
outsiders.description: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

outsiders.name: plague doctor
outsiders.description: When you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

outsiders.name: politician
outsiders.description: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

outsiders.name: puzzlemaster
outsiders.description: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

outsiders.name: recluse
outsiders.description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

outsiders.name: saint
outsiders.description: If you die by execution, your team loses.

outsiders.name: snitch
outsiders.description: Each Minion gets 3 bluffs.

outsiders.name: sweetheart
outsiders.description: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

outsiders.name: tinker
outsiders.description: You might die at any time.

outsiders.name: zealot
outsiders.description: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

minions.name: assassin
minions.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

minions.name: baron
minions.description: there are extra outsiders in play. +2 outsiders.

minions.name: boffin
minions.description: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good role's ability. You both know which.

minions.name: boomdandy
minions.description: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

minions.name: cerenovus
minions.description: each night, choose a player & a good role: the PLAYER HAS TO PRETEND TO BE this role tomorrow, or might be executed.

minions.name: devil's advocate
minions.description: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

minions.name: evil twin
minions.description: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

minions.name: fearmonger
minions.description: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

minions.name: goblin
minions.description: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.

minions.name: godfather
minions.description: you start knowing which outsiders are in play. if 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. -1 or +1 outsider.

minions.name: harpy
minions.description: each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player HAS TO PRETEND that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

minions.name: marionette
minions.description: you think you are a good role, but you are not. the demon knows who you are. you neighbor the demon.

minions.name: mastermind
minions.description: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

minions.name: mezepheles
minions.description: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.

minions.name: organ grinder
minions.description: all Players will say their nominations. Each night votes will be tallied and a player may be executed. choose if you are drunk until dusk.

minions.name: pit-hag
minions.description: Each night*, choose a player & a role they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

minions.name: poisoner
minions.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

minions.name: psychopath
minions.description: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

minions.name: scarlet woman
minions.description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count)

minions.name: spy
minions.description: each night, get to know all Players roles. you might register as good & as a townsfolk or outsider, even if dead.

minions.name: summoner
minions.description: you get 3 bluffs. on the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil demon of your choice. There is no starting demon.

minions.name: vizier
minions.description: All players know you are the Vizier. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

minions.name: widow
minions.description: on your first night, You get to know all players roles & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a widow is in play.

minions.name: witch
minions.description: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

minions.name: wizard
minions.description: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.

minions.name: xaan
minions.description: on night x, all townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. x Outsiders.

demons.name: al-hadikhia
demons.description: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

demons.name: fang gu
demons.description: each night*, choose a player: they die. the 1st outsider this kills becomes an evil fang gu & you die instead. +1 outsider.

demons.name: imp
demons.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

demons.name: kazali
demons.description: each night*, choose a player: they die. You choose which players are which Minions. -x to +x outsiders.

demons.name: legion
demons.description: each night*, a player might die. executions fail if only evil voted. you register as a minion too. Most players are legion.

demons.name: leviathan
demons.description: If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.

demons.name: lil' monsta
demons.description: each night, minions choose who babysits lil' monsta & 'is the demon'. each night*, a player might die. +1 minion.

demons.name: lleech
demons.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead.

demons.name: lord of typhon
demons.description: each night*, choose a player: they die. You get an extra minion. Evil roles are in a line. You are in the middle. -? to +? outsiders.

demons.name: no dashii
demons.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.

demons.name: ojo
demons.description: Each night*, choose a role: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

demons.name: po
demons.description: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

demons.name: pukka
demons.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

demons.name: riot
demons.description: On day 3, Minions become Riot & nominees die but nominate an alive player immediately. This must happen.

demons.name: shabaloth
demons.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

demons.name: vigormortis
demons.description: each night*, choose a player: they die. minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 townsfolk neighbor. -1 outsider.

demons.name: vortox
demons.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

demons.name: yaggababble
demons.description: you start knowing a secret phrase. for each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

demons.name: zombuul
demons.description: each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. the 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

travellers.name: apprentice
travellers.description: on your 1st night, you gain a townsfolk ability (if good) or a minion ability (if evil).

travellers.name: barista
travellers.description: each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. they learn which.

travellers.name: beggar
travellers.description: you get one vote and must use it. if a dead player gives you their vote, you learn their alignment. you are sober and healthy.

travellers.name: bishop
travellers.description: only the storyteller can nominate. at least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.

travellers.name: bone collector
travellers.description: once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

travellers.name: bureaucrat
travellers.description: each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

travellers.name: butcher
travellers.description: each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

travellers.name: deviant
travellers.description: if you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.

travellers.name: gangster
travellers.description: once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbor, if your other alive neighbor agrees.

travellers.name: gnome
travellers.description: all players start knowing a player of your alignment. you may choose to kill anyone who nominates them.

travellers.name: gunslinger
travellers.description: each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.

travellers.name: harlot
travellers.description: each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their role, but you both might die.

travellers.name: judge
travellers.description: once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

travellers.name: matron
travellers.description: each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

travellers.name: scapegoat
travellers.description: if a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

travellers.name: thief
travellers.description: each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

travellers.name: voudon
travellers.description: only you & the dead can vote. they don't need a vote to do so. a 50% majority isn't required.
